TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HatchBrush extends System.Drawing.Brush
Public NotInheritable Class HatchBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class HatchBrush sealed : System::Drawing::Brush

summary.span: 用阴影样式、前景色和背景色定义矩形画笔。

span.span: Defines a rectangular brush with a hatch style, a foreground color, and a background color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从两种颜色进行阴影图案： 通过定义一个，后台，另一个用于通过定义的背景上形成图案的行来填充属性。A hatch pattern is made from two colors: one defined by the , which fills the background and one for the lines that form the pattern over the background defined by the property. 属性定义哪种类型的模式的画笔具有和可从任何值枚举。The property defines what type of pattern the brush has and can be any value from the enumeration. 有多个 50 个元素中的枚举。There are more than fifty elements in the enumeration. 下图显示用水平阴影图案填充的椭圆。The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern. ![影线模式](~/add/media/hatch1.png "影线模式")![Hatch Pattern](~/add/media/hatch1.png "Hatch Pattern") ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建上图中所示。The following example shows how to create the shown in the previous illustration. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.UsingABrush#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingABrush/CS/Class1.cs#41)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.UsingABrush#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingABrush/VB/Class1.vb#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 背景色初始化为黑色。The background color is initialized to black.
